attributes.action: STOP EBAY SELLING IVORY PRODUCTS ON IT'S WEBSITE.
attributes.background: I was amazed to see how many ivory products are being sold on ebay including elephants' feet used for pots and umbrella stands.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. You could start a petition calling for the sale of ivory in the UK to be banned.
